name: Flying Forever
description:
Compete against friends or get first place in the world rankings!

Own version of the game that hooked the world. Reach as far as you can going between the pipes with a flying penguin. Care not fall into the water!

 
 Gameplay very similar to Flappy Bird.
 
- Save Cloud; gets your achievements and high scores anytime. - Share your best score. - Table of scores across Google+, compete against friends or the world. - And achievements!
- With all our support and admiration Dong Nguyen. - Made with Unity Free.
- It's our first game Enjoy!
- Free game with integrated advertising.

Made with Unity 5 & update to Unity 2017.4

Patch Notes:

Version 1.0
* Game Launch

Version 1.1
* Fixed speed
* Fixed collision

Found error achievements. Workaround, uninstall and install the game. Login with G+ everything should be fine. Version 1.2
* Bug fixed on collision
* Some designs have been reworked and improved

Version 1.3
* Fixed no connection bug

Version 1.5
* Code refactored
* Updated to Unity 2017.4
* Elimination of advertising and Facebook elements.
* Reduced size with Android App Bundle

To any incident, we appreciate the, go to our contact address report: 4stonesgamestudio@gmail.com, we will try to solve.
 
Thanks for playing!
